data.name: ForeVR Cornhole
data.description:
This year.... summer lasts ForeVR!

Pick from 50+ unique bags and boards, with classic and creative designs to suit each cornholer! 

Experience our custom beanbag physics, tailored for all throws and strategies, and optimized for realism. 

Immerse yourself in five stunning halls, with more to come!

Rock out to your favorite music and playlists using our YouTube-powered media player, with full multiplayer sync coming soon! 

ğŸŒ½ 50+ unique bags & boards to cornhole your way
ğŸŒ½ 5 Halls
ğŸŒ½ Challengeable NPC Pros in each Hall
ğŸŒ½ YouTube-powered jukebox
ğŸŒ½ Private & quick match multiplayer
ğŸŒ½ 1v1 or 2v2 team battles

Bags, sack toss, dummy boards, doghouse, beanbag tossâ€¦ no matter what you call it, itâ€™s surely the worldâ€™s greatest lawn game. ForeVR Cornhole is the best (and first!) cornhole game for VR!

ForeVR Cornhole v1.1.0.559 brings changes and improvements to the game, and a brand-new game mode: Hall Tour!
 
WHATâ€™S NEW
ğŸŒ½ Hall Tour mode in California Dreaminâ€™!
ğŸŒ½ Media Share! Hosts in a multiplayer party can now share their jukebox media with others.
ğŸŒ½ Faster Quick Match matchmaking
ğŸŒ½ Sped-up bot throwing and improved difficulty
ğŸŒ½ Miscellaneous bug fixes and under-the-hood improvements 

HALL TOUR
Hall Tour is cornhole with a fresh twist. In this game mode, youâ€™ll throw beanbags from different random locations all around the hall, avoiding obstacles! Right now, this is only available in California Dreaminâ€™â€”give it a shot.
 
EARLY ACCESS: MEDIA SHARE
Now, the host in a party has the option to share their media, and other players have the option to individually accept the hostâ€™s invitation. 
 
Please be aware that this feature is in early access, so weâ€™re still ironing out some bugs. Weâ€™re currently aware of some issues, like: 
- If an ad plays before a video, the video will be out-of-sync until the host changes the video
- Some text may clip out of buttons in certain languages
 
â“ Need help, or have a bug to report? Contact our support team at help.forevrgames.com!

Howdy, cornholers! Version 1.1 of ForeVR Cornhole brings a ton of new features, including:

Toss, throw, and lob your hearts out, cornholers! Please consider leaving us a reviewâ€”weâ€™d really appreciate your feedback!
